mrmc.core

Class CovMRMC

  • java.lang.Object
    • mrmc.core.CovMRMC

  • public class CovMRMC
extends java.lang.Object
    Estimates covariance statistics given reader data for two modalities
    • getAUCsReaderAvg,
    • getAUCs,
    • getMoments,
    • getMomentsBiased,
    • getCoefficients,
    Author:
    Xin He, Ph.D,, Brandon D. Gallas, Ph.D, Rohan Pathare

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double[][] AUCs
      The AUCs for each reader and modality [Nreader][2]
      private double[] AUCsReaderAvg
      The reader-averaged auc for each modality
      private double[] coefficients
      The coefficients according to Gallas2009_Commun-Stat-A-Theor_v38p2586 (first element is empty)
      private double[] moments
      The U-statistic moments according to Gallas2009_Commun-Stat-A-Theor_v38p2586 (first element is empty).
      private double[] momentsBiased
      The MLE moments according to Gallas2009_Commun-Stat-A-Theor_v38p2586 (first element is empty).

    • Constructor Detail

      • CovMRMC

        public CovMRMC(double[][][] t0,
       int[][][] d0,
       double[][][] t1,
       int[][][] d1,
       long Nreader,
       long Nnormal,
       long Ndisease)
        Sole constructor for CovMRMC.
        Parameters:
        t0 - Normal scores for all readers and both modalities [Nnormal][Nreader][2]
        d0 - Design matrix for all readers and both modalities [Nnormal][Nreader][2]
        t1 - Scores scores for all readers and both modalities [Ndisease][Nreader][2]
        d1 - Design matrix for all readers and both modalities [Ndisease][Nreader][2]
        Nreader - Number of readers
        Nnormal - Number of normal cases
        Ndisease - Number of disease cases
